channel.title: [REQ]::Setnpc && ::addnpc
channel.description: I am currently using Dodian.. now I see ::addnpc puts the ::setnpc npc you are on the server but how could you save/dump it? Is there anyway? Or is that just to add a unattackable npc to your server till it goes offline?

item.title: [REQ]::Setnpc && ::addnpc
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

You could use a bufferedWriter to write the object info to a configuration file, and load object spawns from that file.

Read full topic
